section.p: Grape provides the best laptops with the latest most software varieties and hardwares so that the user can have a great innovative experience.
The company has a a vision to provide the latest technology to the people of Pakistan.

article.p: The most expensive and the most powerful of our Laptops. Premium laptop with eveything built in a user can ask for.

aside.p:
This laptop can be used by anyone of any profession for any sorts of tasks. The machine is such a complete machine..
Abdullah Iqbal

div.p: GRAPE is the best tech and gadget company in Asia keeping customers updated with the future and latest technology. We deal in flagship mobile phones,laptops,talets and different music accessories.
div.h3: Provide the Best Experience within a Single Touch.
